title: Techniques of swimming
creator_credit: Ruth Irons, Paul Quinlan and Department of Education, Queensland
brief_description: Bill Sweetenham, head coach, and Joe King, assistant coach of the Australian team at the Moscow Olympics, lecture on long distance swimmming and discuss stroke techniques and advanced drills. BEST SUITED TO COACHES AND TEACHERS.
